body_html:
I'll defer to @Maratyszcza on whether cpuinfo in third_party/cpuinfo should be updated for this or not. My gut is that third_party is set to the right version since he's been managing that?

I've temporarily pushed my latest code to this branch plus the master of my fork to test. However I'm getting a failure on running

export EXTRACTED_REPO=https://github.com/orionr/ATen
export FULL_REPO=https://github.com/orionr/pytorch
./tools/aten_mirror.sh

(which is slow) of

Ref 'refs/heads/temporary-split-branch' was rewritten
Switched to branch 'master'
Your branch is up-to-date with 'origin/master'.
Auto-merging third_party/tbb
Adding as third_party/tbb~temporary-split-branch instead
Auto-merging third_party/catch
Adding as third_party/catch~temporary-split-branch instead
Removing aten/src/ATen/cpu/cpuinfo
Removing aten/.gitmodules
Automatic merge failed; fix conflicts and then commit the result.
Everything up-to-date

When I try to fix conflicts I get

git add third_party/catch
error: unable to index file third_party/catch
fatal: updating files failed

Investigating.

body:
I'll defer to @Maratyszcza on whether cpuinfo in `third_party/cpuinfo` should be updated for this or not. My gut is that third_party is set to the right version since he's been managing that?

I've temporarily pushed my latest code to this branch plus the master of my fork to test. However I'm getting a failure on running

```
export EXTRACTED_REPO=https://github.com/orionr/ATen
export FULL_REPO=https://github.com/orionr/pytorch
./tools/aten_mirror.sh
```
(which is slow) of

```
Ref 'refs/heads/temporary-split-branch' was rewritten
Switched to branch 'master'
Your branch is up-to-date with 'origin/master'.
Auto-merging third_party/tbb
Adding as third_party/tbb~temporary-split-branch instead
Auto-merging third_party/catch
Adding as third_party/catch~temporary-split-branch instead
Removing aten/src/ATen/cpu/cpuinfo
Removing aten/.gitmodules
Automatic merge failed; fix conflicts and then commit the result.
Everything up-to-date
```
When I try to fix conflicts I get
```
git add third_party/catch
error: unable to index file third_party/catch
fatal: updating files failed
```
Investigating.
